title: User registration with valid data
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid required information.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid user information including username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Check that the user is registered successfully and redirected to the MFA setup page.

title: Login with correct credentials and MFA
description: Verify a user can login with correct username and password and complete MFA verification.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username and password.
Click the login button.
Complete the MFA verification as prompted.
Verify the user is successfully logged in to their respective portal.

title: Login attempt with invalid password
description: Verify the system prevents login when an incorrect password is entered.

steps.description: Go to the login page.
Enter a valid username and an incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is denied and an error message about invalid credentials is displayed.

title: Password reset workflow
description: Verify that users can initiate and complete the password reset process successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page.
Input a registered email address and submit the request.
Verify the system sends a password reset email.
Follow the email link and enter a new password.
Submit the new password to reset.
Confirm the password is reset and user can login with new credentials.

title: Account lockout after multiple failed login attempts
description: Verify that an account is locked after a threshold of unsuccessful login attempts to prevent brute force attacks.

steps.description: Attempt to login with a valid username and incorrect password repeatedly over the lockout threshold.
Verify the account is locked, preventing further login attempts and displaying an account locked message.

title: Session timeout triggers warning popup
description: Verify that the session timeout mechanism detects idle activity, triggers a warning popup before logout.

steps.description: Login and remain idle until the idle detection period elapses.
Verify a warning popup appears alerting the user of imminent session timeout.
Respond to the warning popup to continue session.
Verify the session continues without logout.

title: Session expires after no response to idle warning
description: Verify that the user is automatically logged out after inactivity with no response to the session timeout warning popup.

steps.description: Login successfully and stay idle until the session timeout warning popup appears.
Do not respond to the warning popup.
Verify the session automatically terminates and user is redirected to the login page.

title: Patient appointment booking process
description: Verify a patient can successfully book an appointment including selecting specialty, doctor, date, and time.

steps.description: Patient logs in and navigates to the appointment booking section.
Searches and selects doctor by specialty.
Chooses available appointment date and time.
Confirms the booking.
Verify confirmation of appointment booking is displayed with correct details.

title: Handle appointment booking with unavailable timeslot
description: Verify the system handles attempts to book an already occupied or invalid appointment slot gracefully.

steps.description: Patient attempts to book an appointment at a time slot already booked by another patient.
Verify a clear error message is displayed indicating the slot is unavailable and user is prompted to select another slot.

title: Patient views detailed medical records including prescriptions and lab results
description: Verify that a patient can access their full medical records with detailed history including prescriptions and lab results without errors.

steps.description: Patient logs in and navigates to the medical records section.
Verify detailed medical history is displayed including prescriptions and lab results.
Navigate through interactive patient timeline to validate historical data presentation.
Check that all data loads correctly without errors.

title: Validate FHIR-compliant data export
description: Verify the patient can export their medical data using the FHIR standard and that the output is valid and complete.

steps.description: Patient logs in and accesses the FHIR export feature.
Initiate export of health data.
Verify that valid FHIR-compliant data file is generated and downloadable.

title: Doctor manages patient list and appointment scheduling
description: Verify doctors can view their patient list, schedule, modify, and cancel appointments with correct updates.

steps.description: Doctor logs in and navigates to patient list.
Verify all assigned patients are listed correctly.
Navigate to appointment management, schedule a new appointment for a patient.
Verify the new appointment is saved and reflected in the schedule.
Modify an existing appointment and cancel another.
Verify respective updates and cancellations are correctly processed.

title: Doctor issues prescriptions and lab orders
description: Verify doctors can create, update, and delete prescriptions and lab orders accurately for patients.

steps.description: Doctor logs in and accesses prescription form for a patient.
Create a new prescription with valid details and submit.
Verify the prescription is saved and visible in patient records.
Access lab order form, create a lab order, and submit.
Verify the lab order is correctly recorded and tracked.
Update and delete existing prescriptions and lab orders.
Verify updates and deletions are accurately reflected.

title: Break-glass emergency data access by doctor
description: Verify that doctors can access critical patient data using emergency break-glass access under approved scenarios.

steps.description: Doctor attempts to access protected patient data under emergency break-glass protocol.
Verify that access is granted with proper audit logging and warnings display.

title: Admin user management functions
description: Verify administrators can create, modify, and delete user accounts with correct role assignments.

steps.description: Admin logs in and navigates to user management portal.
Creates a new user with specific role and submits.
Verify the user is created and visible in the user list.
Modify existing userâ€™s data and role, then save.
Verify updates are saved and reflected accurately.
Delete a user account.
Verify user is removed and cannot access the system.

title: Admin audit log monitoring
description: Verify that admin can view and search audit logs for compliance and that logs are accurate and complete.

steps.description: Admin logs in and navigates to audit log section.
Filter logs by date, user, and event type.
Verify filtered logs display correctly with accurate event details.

title: Admin updates system configuration securely
description: Verify that administrators can change system settings and the changes persist without data leaks.

steps.description: Admin accesses system settings page.
Modify various configuration options and save changes.
Verify changes are saved correctly and do not expose sensitive data.

title: Pharmacist manages prescription queue
description: Verify that pharmacists can view, verify, and update the prescription queue correctly.

steps.description: Pharmacist logs in and views prescription queue.
Verify prescriptions awaiting verification are visible and accurate.
Verify a prescription and mark it ready for dispensing.
Verify prescription status updates and is removed from queue after dispensing.

title: Pharmacist performs medication dispensing
description: Verify pharmacists can dispense medications correctly after prescription verification with accurate state updates.

steps.description: Pharmacist selects a verified prescription to dispense medication.
Completes dispensing process confirming medication details.
Verify medication dispensing is recorded and prescription status updates to completed.

title: Lab technician processes test orders and uploads results
description: Verify lab technicians can receive test orders, mark tests as completed, and upload results with correct data linkage.

steps.description: Lab technician logs in and views pending test orders.
Verify all assigned test orders are displayed correctly.
Perform test and upload test results via the result upload form.
Verify test order status updates to completed and results are linked to patient records.

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that users cannot access features and data outside their assigned roles.

steps.description: Log in as each user role: patient, doctor, pharmacist, lab technician, admin.
Attempt to access restricted features or data outside user role permissions.
Verify access is denied with appropriate error or navigation protection for unauthorized features.

title: UI component library consistency under dark and light themes
description: Verify all reusable UI components render correctly and consistently in both dark and light theme modes.

steps.description: Switch application between dark and light themes.
Verify all UI components such as buttons, inputs, dialogs, cards, tables display properly with correct styles and no visual regressions.
Interact with components to ensure functional behavior is unaffected by theme changes.
Confirm functional and visual consistency across themes.
